verses.text: Now it came to pass in the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \add that\add* \w Sennacherib|strong="H5576"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against all the \w defenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w took|strong="H8610"\w* them.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w* from \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* with a \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w army|strong="H2426"\w*. And he \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by the \w conduit|strong="H8585"\w* of the \w upper|strong="H5945"\w* \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* in the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* of the \w fuller’s|strong="H3526"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

Then came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* unto him \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w*, \w Hilkiah’s|strong="H2518"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, which was over the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w*, \w Asaph’s|strong="H0623"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, the \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*.\f + \fr 36.3 \ft scribe: or, secretary\f*

¶ And \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* ye now to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, What \w confidence|strong="H0986"\w* \add is\add* this wherein thou \w trustest|strong="H0982"\w*?

I \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add sayest thou\add*, (but \add they are but\add* \w vain|strong="H8193"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*) \add I have\add* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* and \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* for \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: now on whom dost thou \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*, that thou \w rebellest|strong="H4775"\w* against me?\f + \fr 36.5 \ft vain…: Heb. a word of lips\f*\f + \fr 36.5 \ft I have…: or, but counsel and strength are for the war\f*

Lo, thou \w trustest|strong="H0982"\w* in the \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* of this \w broken|strong="H7533"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*, on \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; whereon if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lean|strong="H5564"\w*, it will \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, and \w pierce|strong="H5344"\w* it: so \add is\add* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to all that \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in him.

But if thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to me, We \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \add is it\add* not he, whose high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* and whose \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* hath taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, Ye shall \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* this \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*?

Now therefore give \w pledges|strong="H6148"\w*, I pray thee, to my \w master|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, if thou be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* on thy part to \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w riders|strong="H7392"\w* upon them.\f + \fr 36.8 \ft pledges: or, hostages\f*

How then wilt thou turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w captain|strong="H6346"\w* of the \w least|strong="H6996"\w* of my \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and put thy \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* on \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* for \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and for \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*?

And am I now come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w without|strong="H1107"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* against this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* it? the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* it.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w* and \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w* and \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* unto \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w*, \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*, I pray thee, unto thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* in the Syrian \w language|strong="H0762"\w*; for we \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \add it:\add* and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* not to us in the \w Jews’ language|strong="H3066"\w*, in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* on the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

¶ But \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Hath my \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w* and to thee to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*? \add hath he\add* not \add sent me\add* to the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, that they may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* their own \w dung|strong="H2716"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* their own \w piss|strong="H4325"\w* with you?

Then \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* in the \w Jews’ language|strong="H3066"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, Let not \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w deceive|strong="H5377"\w* you: for he shall not be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* you.

Neither let \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* make you \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w surely|strong="H5337"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* us: this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall not be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

\w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* not to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*: for thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \add an agreement\add* with me \add by\add* a \w present|strong="H1293"\w*, and come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to me: and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* ye every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of his \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of his fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* ye every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of his own \w cistern|strong="H0953"\w*;\f + \fr 36.16 \ft Make…: or, Seek my favour by a present: Heb. Make with me a blessing\f*

Until I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and take you \w away|strong="H3947"\w* to a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* like your own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* and \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*.

\add Beware\add* lest \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w persuade|strong="H5496"\w* you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* us. Hath \w any|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* his \w land|strong="H0776"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*?

Where \add are\add* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w* and \w Arphad|strong="H0774"\w*? where \add are\add* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Sepharvaim|strong="H5617"\w*? and have they \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* out of my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

Who \add are they\add* among all the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of these \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*, that have \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* out of my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* should \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* out of my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

But they held their \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, and \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him not a \w word|strong="H1697"\w*: for the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* was, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Answer|strong="H6030"\w* him not.

¶ Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, that \add was\add* over the \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, the \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*, to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* with \add their\add* \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* \w rent|strong="H7167"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w*.
